# [孿生質數_twin prime](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twin_prime)
```
孿生質數  指 一對質數，它們之間相差2


最小的35對孿生質數（1000以內的孿生質數）（OEIS A001359及OEIS A006512)： 
(3, 5), (5, 7), (11, 13), (17, 19), (29, 31), (41, 43), (59, 61), (71, 73), (101, 103), (107, 109), (137, 139), 
(149, 151), (179, 181), (191, 193), (197, 199), (227, 229), (239, 241), (269, 271), (281, 283), (311, 313), (347, 349), 
(419, 421), (431, 433), (461, 463), (521, 523), (569, 571), (599, 601), (617, 619), (641, 643), (659, 661), 
(809, 811), (821, 823), (827, 829), (857, 859), (881, 883)
```
## 分析 如果使用使用孿生質數 建立RSA會怎麼被破解
```
n1 = p*q
n2 = (p+2)*(q+2)
```
分別計算n1及n2的歐拉函數
```
n1 的phi = (p-1)*(q-1) = pq - (p+q) + 1 = n1 - (p+q) +1
 
n2 的phi = (p+1)*(q+1) = pq + (p+q) + 1 = n1 + (p+q) +1
```

整理上述式子,會得到
```
n2 = (p+2)*(q+2) = p*q + 2( p+q ) + 4 = n1+ 2( p+q ) + 4
```
所以會得到
```
p+q = ( n2 - n1 - 4 )/2
```

題目會給n1,n2 因此可以算出 p+q


# 題目: YANG_RSA-3
```
孿生質數(Twin prime)指假設 p 是質數且 p + 2 也是質數
如 (3,5), (17,19), (41,43) …

在RSA中，如果有兩把公鑰其符合 n1 = p * q n2 = (p+2) * (q+2)
則可以在不用分解 n 的情況下得到 phi 來進行解密。

提示1 : 可以參考此篇簡報第8頁
https://www.slideshare.net/ssuseraba268/rsa-in-ctf

提示2 : 也可以參考其它CTF write up
https://ctftime.org/task/2731
```

```
c = 

e = 10000001

n1 = 

n2 = 
```
## RSA-3-code  ==> 如何產生twin-prime  ==> 如何出題
```
from Crypto.Util import number

def getTwin(n):
	while True:
		p = number.getPrime(n)
		if number.isPrime(p+2):
			return p

p = getTwin(1650)
q = getTwin(2000)
n1 = p * q
n2 = (p+2) * (q+2)
e = 10000001
m = libnum.s2n(open('flag').read().strip())
c = pow(pow(m,e,n1),e,n2)

with open('output.txt','w') as f:
	f.write('c = %d \n\n' % c)
	f.write('e = %d \n\n' % e)
	f.write('n1 = %d \n\n' % n1)
	f.write('n2 = %d \n\n' % n2)
```
## 解答
```python
#!/usr/bin/env python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
# import gmpy2
from sympy import mod_inverse

c = 

e = 10000001

n1 = 

n2 = 


p_q = (n2 - n1 - 4) // 2  # p_q ==p+q

n1_phi = n1 - p_q + 1
n2_phi = n1 + p_q + 1

#d1 = int(gmpy2.invert(e, n1_phi))
#d2 = int(gmpy2.invert(e, n2_phi))
d1 = mod_inverse(e, n1_phi)
d2 = mod_inverse(e, n2_phi)

m = pow(pow(c,d2,n2),d1,n1)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
```
